content.detailedDescription: I was taking the dog outside on an absolutely clear summer night. while waiting for my dog, i was looking around in the sky at all the stars when all of a sudden, over top of my house and my neighbor's house appeared what i call a combination fireball/pinwheel shaped object. it was a perfectly round shape ball of fire in the middle with small flame tips around the edge. it is hard to say how big the object was or how high the object was over my house,probably because it was at night. but it seemed very close and possibly 4 ft. in diameter from where i was standing. it came out of nowhere (not falling out of sky) as though it was traveling from an east-west straight line direction. as quickly as it appeared, within a few seconds, it disappeared. when i say disappeared, i mean it completely vanished. it did not explode away or make any sound what so ever. have no idea what this was or if any one else has ever seen any object like this in the sky before. i can tell you one thing, it definitely startled me when i saw this thing! haven't really told too many people about this over the years except for a few family members. i would like to find some ufo photos to see if there is anything close to what i saw.
content.summary: I was taking the dog outside and saw a pinwheel shaped/ fireball object appear from nowhere over my house.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out of my window, toward pleasantdale rd. i saw a white object come in roof top and then dissappeared. i then looked up and saw it ,it was blinking and starlight. we noticed that it was trying to stay still was having trouble. it was wabbling. my husband and son also watched it. there was a lots of planes in the area. this was not a plane.I had to go and do something, when i came back it was gone.This time i felt ok. not sick.
content.summary: Looked out of window i saw an object come rooftop and took off, we watched it for a while.

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming back from a delivery going east on jonesboro rd and i just happened to see a blue orb come down from the sky like a comet then pulled up as in raised its elevation back up into the sky into a cloud. simply unbelievable. i dont know how big it was because it was a long way off.
im convinced it was maned by the way it flew/acted.
content.summary: Blue star-like orb

content.detailedDescription:
Nighttime ufo fleet sighting - orion? - huntington beach - california - december 2008

december 12, 2008 11:30 pm 

my wife was outside and noticed a fleet of lights moving across the night sky. she asked me to come look at this���i looked up and saw what looked like bright stars moving from northwest to southeast across my night sky. she pointed out three of the lights in the middle of the group that were moving in a diagonal row.  there were scattered clouds that night moving west to east. the lights just kept coming and coming. there had to be at least a hundred of these lights in all. they were all moving at the same speed and direction, maintaining the same distance from each other, across the night sky. the lights were slightly different in colors and brightness, some were pure white and bright, some were slightly orange-red, and some were blue-white. to us they all appeared to be at the same altitude moving swiftly, taking over a full minute to cross over our entire night sky. it was just amazing how many of them there were, and the speed they must have been going. i���ve seen many satellites in the past moving across the night sky and these lights were moving at twice the speed of them. once the fleet had moved past us there were no more lights trailing behind.  

the next morning i thought about the three stars that my wife had pointed out to me when i had first joined her outside. then it hit me, orion, the constellation of orion, the belt!  that night i showed her the constellation of orion in the sky; i asked her if anything looked familiar? without hesitation she pointed to the three stars of orion���s belt. i printed out a picture of orion and held it up over my head, as strange as this might be, i feel that the fleet of lights was moving in the formation of the constellation orion. 

has anyone ever seen, or have there ever been any reported sightings like this?
content.summary: Fleet - nighttime - orion?

content.detailedDescription:
The summer of approx '96, three lights could be seen along the horizon for several weeks from west side of columbus towards dayton (basically west of columbus). one light would travel up & down on the right of the horizon; one would travel from the left of the horizon, slowly right, then shoot back across to the left, only to start all over again; the other light would start towards the botttom of the horizon, travel up & and the same time, come towards me, then back down. one clear, calm night i decided to see if i could attract that one. as i drove towards them through relatively empty country roads around midnight, i would flash my bright lights towards them. by the time i got to the london ohio area, i noticed one of the lights was coming a lot closer to me. eventually, i could make out a shape. so i stop on a dirt entry road of a local field, intentionally left my car running, lights & radio on, & got out. whatever this thing was, it silently floated over me about 100-200 feet overhead. it was black (or dark blue. it had what i would describe as "fat" wings attached to a tear drop shape with no tail fins. there were port hole like lights along both "wings", and one spot light like on the nose of the craft & at each wing tip. the lights were pointing to the ground, but not actually making contact with the ground that i could see. while it drifted over me, i was looking straight up & made notice that there was no interruption with my car's function. this thing floated over my car & over towards columbus. i looked back towards the other two light to see what they were doing. they haven't moved. i looked back to see the thing that went over me & it was gone - no where to be seen. this took about 1��� seconds. i have no idea where that thing went. 
a few days later, those light disappeared & to date, i haven't seen them again.
interesting note, i told a few friends about the lights & they verified they have seen them too, but never with the experience i had. a couple friends told me they could even see them from interstate 70 traveling west from columbus!

crude drawings are attached. the 'object' is basically correct, but the proportions aren't perfect. the lights on the wing tips & nose are shown as shining down to the ground.
content.summary: Over head

content.detailedDescription:
i woke up to turn over and opened my eyes,and saw 2 balls of light swinging up and down,then side to side.I just stared at these 2 things moving slowly.I thought someone was outside w/a purple flashlight trying to see thru the closed blinds!So i was ready to hop out of bed to get a closer look,and 1 shot a white beam of light in my eyes!So i jumped out of bed and the 2 balls of light were gone.I immediatly ran into my backyard to get the person that shot that light into my eyes and there was no-one there!I went back into my room to find a source of light but couldn't. what size can a ufo be? :iv'e also had a missing time experiance.My mom was going to take me to dmv and said she'd be here at 8am,and to have all my paperwork ready.The next thing i knew was hearing the auto-garage door open.I was in a freeze position,then realized it was the next day allready.When she came in i said are you ready to go? she said yes!But what happened to the night?I put on my clothes to go,got my papers out but was perplex that i had just talked with her 12 hrs ago,and now it's the next day[this happened 2 years ago]i also had missing objects dissapear then reappear in same spot i looked for days.I never believe in ufos and other things paranormal,but since i called the cops 44x in 9 months,they said that i was missplacing these objects,and it was mt imagination.I was doing it myself but forgetting!?By coinscienece i turned on the am to listen to the news one night,and art bell was on the topic of 'poltergiest',i got my dictionary and looked it up and was completley blown away with the definition,noisy,mischivious,tapping.Rapping,weird sounds,voices,lights turned off that i kept on.Hearing the doorknob jiggle,slidebolt open,then saw 3 separate apperitions,2 girls,1 guy,in day time and night time.Ghosts?
after hearing that show i went to the library and check out every book on ufos and poltergiests,until i read every book.Eps.By linda moulon howe's[glimpes of other realities vol 1+2]and jerome clarks ufo encyclopedia.I am a member of mufon id#12765.After reading all books i purchaced a pc to research more about this strange phenomemon.This dates back to 3-2004,before i heard art bell,and my pc is less than 1 years old.Is this stuff real? all i can say is i'm not a skeptic any more!Please feel free to
email me at posted address.In all sincerness and honesty i submit this report to be fact!Thank you,from,<<<ar>>>12-13-08
content.summary: Two purplish/white 1/2 dollar sized ping poning up and down inside room.

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting around our usual fire in the backyard,my wife suddenly  grab me and says look look. i ask where.  she says between the treees.  i then began to focus on what looke like to me a ball of amber light. she said it appeared from no where, glowing really brightly. i could see a black line making a motion in the ball of light. it look like a band of lights where moving from left to right in the center of the object.  i guess that is what made the black apear to be moving, or the entire object was rotating. next it started to make all color, red, white, purple, orange,  rainbow colors. then it started to flash one color. it would flash red,then white.  im really thinking plane at that point.  next it would turn back to the amber light with the motion in it again. the  amber  color  was like something was on fire in the sky, it had a lot of motion in it. u could really see all the colors it was making. next i tell my wife to go  get the video camera.  

while she is looking for keys so she can get the camera out of the truck, i watch the object make serpentine motions over the trees.  i could tell it was at least 200 yards away becaude i would loose site of it behind a tree. then it would reappear on the other side of the tree.  at some point i could see it over the tree also.  so i basically stayed in the same area. it takes her close to 5 minutes to bring me back the camera, and it is still there. i try to video it through the trees, but i couldnt finde it in the camera. so we watch it for a few more minutes, while trying to figure out what to do. 
 
we decide to get in the truck and  drive  to the object.  there is a cut out over a sewer lake there, so the skies is clear at least to the trees the object was dipping behind. so we drive there in less than 2 minutes. the cut out is on  the street behind our street.  we pull up to the fence around the sewer pond and beging to watch the object. i see a red light and a white light. i tell my wife it's a plane.  that's a air plane doing search manuver.  she starts argueing with me that it is round lights that are rotating in a circle.   i tell here again that it is a plane searching for something. it is taking me forever to get it in the view of  the camera. im not really trying that hard because it looks like a planes seriously.   im not paying attention to that this thing just stopped and hovered in one place. im only thinking i can  get it on video now that it stopped moving. it paused for a few seconds, like it had noticed that we was there.  it then took off headed north.  

the moon was still low in the sky so i aimed for it. i brought the moon into view.  that's when i go it on tape.  to the naked eye it looked like a plane  going across the sky .  through the camera i could see that a red light was behind a white light, but could not see a structure. i knew then that it wasnt a plane by the position of the red light to the white one.  we was there  3 or 4 minutes before i got it into the camera's field of view.  i have about 10 seconds of the object on video before it got out of site behind the tree.

we decide to get back in the truck and see if we can get another look when it  goes across the area where it wasnt any tree.  we didnt see it again. if it would have keep the same speed that it took off at, we should have been able to see it.  i veiwed the video and was thinking piece of crap.... i tell my wife, man we had it.. i just couldnt get the distance right on the camera. 

i go home and download it to my cpu using sony vegas 5.0 program.  next it comes to me how i watched a guy do a frame by frame on some shuttle explosion video. i try the frame by frame on my video. all i can say is wow.  i cant believe it
i know some of the light effects is motion blurr. what looked like single lights to the naked eyes was several lights. sometimes as many as 9 rainbow like each a different color.  they made triangle patterns, x patterns, they made spiral patterns, helix patterns.  i know that the shaking on my hands could not have made all those effects to the lights, plus i was filming leaning on a fence.  plus u could see multiple effects on a  single frame. there was quite a  bit of patern changing in the ten  good seconds of video.  

at one point it looks like a saturn shape ufo.  but then it kinda looks like four diamonds shape lights.   i have the original video. all the motion in the video is by my movements, this thing took off on a level plane.  it looked to be slowly speeding up slowly and rising.  like a plane to the naked eye. i used a sony handycam dcr-trv 280
content.summary: Round multicolored lights ufo video.... need video editing aplication to see true effects.

content.detailedDescription: I saw a very bright whitish-yellow pulsating triangular light in the eastern sky while leaving the local kmart.  the light was probably a satallite since it was not moving.  i was getting my 2 toddlers into my truck and since i am a mufon field investigator, i waited till i got home to check the satallite tracking websites to see what it was.
content.summary: Bright pulsating triangular light in the eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
A similar experience of the oval spheres in the room of a lady,
who reported a simmilar case like mine.

i am a mufon member an i have been reluctant to mention something
so incredible & amazing like this that marks to the redeculous.
during the past several months i have noticed while awake in my
bed that the wall in front of me shows a small bean of light which
present not a reflection from a light or other object, this spot
appears when i start thinking of it or it present by itself, this
spot of life measure around half an inch and has moved to diferent
side in the wall.  what could this be?  a soul of one of my ancestors
i do not have a clue? if any one of the persons posting messages
at mufon site & have had a similar experience please; send a e-mail 
reflecting your point of view or similar experience.  

in the past i have had more than ten experiences with ufo including
one when i was around 18 years old when i believe was abducted or 
visited from an allien. i have seen more than 8 eight different types
of craft including a small moving clouds within a hundred to two
hundred feet away.
content.summary: Spot of blinking light in my room for many months.

content.detailedDescription:
At 9pm my girlfriend ronna, noticed a bright flickering light in the sky from our aptartment window.  i went to look and noticed not only was it flickering but appeared to change color and speed that the colors changed.  i grabbed a pair of low power binocs and my cell phone to use the electronic compass feature.  looking through the binocs, it was clear enough to make out 3 distinct colors of red, green and white, whcih seem to be on the corners of what appeared to be a triangular shape.  the lights were changing color from tip to tip of the triangle.  on my compass the heading was 37 degrees ne, just below "orion's belt".  the activity seemed to become static.  a plane flew just beneath it and the flickering pattern began again and very fast.  i observed other lights and stars in the sky to base it as the brightest light in the sky.  it is now 9:40pm and it still remains in the same position in the sky and still active.  (note :  about 2 weeks back we both experienced the same exact thing 2 miles from here, directly opposite in compass position in the skies over what would be montgomery county, pa. but viewed with the naked eye during peak philly air traffic)

kg
content.summary: Rotating colored lights

content.detailedDescription: I was t an outdoor music event when i took my break from the stage and went to lay on the hood of my car when i noticed it. the sphere was at a good height and at first i thought it was a plane or helicopter but noticed no movement. i then figured maybe it was the space station of shuttle, but no shuttle flights were up. i then thought maybe it was a satellite, but i dont think you can see any satellites from the ground at nearing sundown. i ask 3 other friends if they say it too but we all could not figure what it was. then i looked around and noticed other people had noticed it too. there were about 500 people at this event in a residential area. i cant be certain on date or time but we did notice this object just floating there not moving in synchronic orbit above us. i couldnt tell you the height but i would guess above 5000 ft. a few minutes later it seem to just disappear. i didnt see when or how but i just look back up and it was gone. a silver spherical object is the way i would describe it. i was not scared but confused at first then in awe. it was a sunday about 2 hours from sundown.
content.summary: A silvery dot floating stationary at high altitude.

content.detailedDescription: I  was in chico calif..In the heat of summer the farmers did their tractor work in the cool of the evening.  i read in the chico enterprise of farmers seeing these strange lights drifting all over the properties.  i decided to go out and look see.  it was a little after midnight and i was on the old highway going to gridley when i stopped and watchad what looked like a streetlight moving slowly  over an orchard.  i found a rural road leeding in that direction and made my way in that direction.  i came upon a small bridge over a creek.  got out of the car and observed several orbs a mile or so away slowly moving around.  i got out of my car and sat on my hood for awhile when suddenly a huge light about the size of a large room just lit up.  i got off the hood and walked one way  than another, but i couldn't see  any shape except for that huge light.  it wasn't really bright..Just a glowing orb.  after a while i got in my car and drove home.  i told my brother about it the next day and he wouldn't believe me..So i took him out the next night night about the same time.  as we got on the new highway(99). we saw 2 orbs floating down a hill onto the valley floor. one continued down towards where i was the night before..The other one came towards the old highway and the light went out.  i told my brother it landed and i could see by the outline of the hill just about where it went down.  i drove back and onto the old highway.  i msde a u turn and pulled off the road.We got out of the car and leaned against it..I noticed what looked like smoke all around the base of a power tower..I walked away on one side and than the other side..I could see for a couple miles..But not into the smoke..(they don't use smudge pots in july)  i reached into my car to retrieve a flashlight when the hairs went up on my head and something warned me not to pick up the light.  i told my brother to get in the car..We were leaving.  we got back to the little bridge i was on last night and sat on the hood..It wasn't long before they were back and moving slowly in the distance.  suddenly two what looked like headlights came on off to out left and i told my brother there were someone else there..I decided to push the car off the bridge without the lights or motor so as not to  give us away..Suddenly the two lights seperated and now i became concerned..I drove down into the orchard away from the bridge..I backed the car off the road so my lights could be seen from a distance and blinked my lights..Nothing so we went on home.  when i got back to the bay area i found the only group i could find that studied ufo's..Nicap was run by paul cerny in palo alto.  i joined and did some investigating work with him.  he asked me to pick up a mr j allen hynec at the s.F airport for his talk at the college in santa clara..
content.summary: 5 or 6 hovering   lg oval light/ the size of a lg room  less than 100 ft away.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were deer hunting on miller mountain.  it had snowed abit the night before up on the top, which made us happy because we could now spot fresh deer tracks in the new snow. all of the top dirt roads are dead ends and about 1-2 miles long. the snow clouds had cleared and we had a sunny sky with puffy clouds.  we decided to take one of the "back side" western facing roads that takes you along the steepest part of the mountain, pretty much straight up and down and heavily forested.  we were happy that morning to notice that there hadn't been any other vehicles up on the top back roads yet that day, because there were no tire tracks in the fresh snow.

we proceeded to take our time along this road with my husband driving.  we came over a rise about half way to the end and my husband said "what's that?".  i was looking out of my side window for deer tracks and turned my head forward to look out the windshield ahead.  i noticed a "very shiny and brite" metal object maybe 8'- 10' wide, in the road ahead apx. 50 to 75 yards away.  looking at it, the first words out of my mouth were "oh, there's a pickup ahead of us."  it looked like a new, extremely shiny chrome pickup rollbar with two lights on top ... but i could not see a "pickup", only what i thought was a roll bar.  then my husband said "no, there are no pickup tire tracks in the snow ahead of us and we are on a dead end road."  as i leaned down to get the binoculars and come back up to look it was gone.  i said "well, let's go to the end just to see".  we drove to the end and indeed, there were no fresh tire tracks in the snow at the end either.  we talked about what we had seen, and came to the conclusion that no pickup could have gone over the edge of the cliff or gone up the side of the mountain ... it had to have been a ufo.  i asked him what he saw as i was getting the binoculars off the pickup floor, he said "it just kinda floated up abit off the road and disappeared."  we did not see it again, nor did we stop and get out of the pickup where it had cloaked itself.
content.summary: Day sighting, landed or hovering over rural dirt road. extremely shiny, bright tubular metal object, cloaked itself.

content.detailedDescription:
About 6:00 pm 12-11-2008 i was sleeping and i saw a
bright white glow of a light comeing from a person
but i did not see the person. as soon as i awoke the
light went away as i realised that i was being disterbed
from my sleep. i got up for a few minets and went back to
sleep about 30 minets later and about 9:30 pm 12-11-2008.
a girl i thing was sitting on me she was not heavey and
she kissed me on my right side of my face and got off of me
and walked away into the darkness of my room. and i got up
and ate something in the kitchen because she had disterbed
me as i was sleeping. i am pertty shure all she did was sit
on me and maybe looked at me she may have talked to me while
i was in a sleeping state i do not know for shure. but she
seemed plessent about something. she acted as if she knew
me for a while. there was not much too this encounter.
content.summary: Et encounter.

content.detailedDescription:
This was witnessed by myself(sandra), my son and his girlfriend.
we live in forested, mountainous terrain.

on the partly cloudy moonlit night of dec.12, at 9.P.M,my son was walking our dog when he looked up and saw 30-40 flying lights in the sky all goin east to west.He ran inside to get me and his girlfriend outside,and we also saw 1(one) large triangle and a long cigar like object hovering pretty far up, all of these object made no sound whatsoever, these craft had amber lights. my son's girlfriend saw one split apart and joined again.There was another one erratically shooting straight up in the sky.About 5 minutes later 2 planes making the distinct jet engine sound had flown over and circled a larger object but the object stopped moving when the planes had shown up.This lasted for around 15-20 minutes untill all the action had stopped,all the craft had flown out of view,every now and then a similar object would fly over the same direction east to west.
 our feelings were of awe, curiosity and amazement, this is not the first time we have witnessed strange objects in the sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 30-40 moving star-like objects

content.detailedDescription:
As i was asleep in a camper type trailer atop a hill ne of showlow, i was awakened by very bright lights coming into one of the windows.  i sat up and after re-orienting myself, i looked out to the ne and saw several very large, intense, multi-colored, slowly pulsating lights.  we were atop a hill and the lights were app. 100' off the ground and did not move. after a couple minutes, the colored lights went out and a single bright white orb appeared immediatley to the left of where the colored lights had been.  this white light remained stationary for about 30 seconds and then began to move to the left and then at a faster pace, began to come in the direction of the trailer.  at this point, i hurried to the rear of the camper, awoke my girlfriend and grabbed my handgun as i was certain of a contact with something or somebody.  we both returned to the window and at this point the show was over.  everthing was totally dark.

i was never able to make out the shape of any type of vehicle and can't make a guess as to how far away these lights were.  and at no time did i hear anything out of the ordinary.  i am a retired law enforcement officer and don't mind saying my legs were shaking and my knees got weak both during and for several hours after this episode.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multi colored slowly pulsating lights app.100' aloft.

content.detailedDescription: Coming out of the quickmart around 1:15am iwas getting in my vehicle when i looked up and noticed this bright green sphere like object falling to earth at high speed and at a angle not accustomed to a airplane landing. what struck me about this object was its sphere shape and green color and size of this object as it fell . i thought meteoir but htis size was huge and its glow and sphere shape. i'm sure i'm not the only one who seen this cause there was a highway next to me which was more elevated. i went to search remote area but with no success.
content.summary: Green sphere like object  fell from the sky to where i'm not sure . i search a few mile s in diameter of where i thought it to be crashed.

content.detailedDescription:
my brother and i were driving south bound on rt 1 near kingston ri at around 5:10-5:15 p.M, to visit our mother and sister. i was looking west out the window at the sky, when i noticed 3 blinking, bobbing lights like stars in a triangular formation in the sky. they were blinking white, green and pink. at first i ignored it and turned away. but when i looked again, between them was a line of white light between them. as i continued to look on trying to figure out what i was looking at, a series of rectangular bands of shimmering rainbow energy/light began glowing between the power lines only 15 to the right of the car. these bands appeared and disappeared 3 times as we drove down the road before i iost sight of the lights in the sky.

i couldn't believe what i was seeing. i yelled to my brother to look at the lights to my brother but he couldn't see the power lines as they were blocked by the roof of the car, and we were rounding a big curve in the road.

i was very excited, and felt like i was being shown something very special. for the past month i have seen similar lights in the sky. one outside of my window in my apartment, which i showed to roomates, and also similar lights at my brothers apartment, though i have never seen rainbow bands of light like i did that night.
content.summary: A line of white appeared in the sky, and it flashed rectangular bands of rainbow energy near our car.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving my family west on us 58 at about 3:30pm; i don���t know the exact time. it was a bright and relatively clear day. something in the sky slightly ahead and to the north caught my attention. i couldn���t make out what is was at first, so i tried to observe it as closely and often as i could considering that i had to watch the road and that some roadside power lines obscured my view. it was metallic gray in color and appeared to have more mass in the center and possibly some sort of rim. i tried to match it to common plane types, but i couldn���t. it was closer than a jet and had no contrail (though a jet at low altitude on ascent or descent wouldn���t have one, i guess���but the nearest jet-supporting airport is 60 miles away). yet it was grayer than most prop planes i���ve seen from our local airport, and i couldn���t make out any wings. it traveled ahead of us smoothly and slowly. i kept trying to observe it, but i eventually lost sight of it. the entire time, i wasn���t able to definitively call it an airplane, though it could well have been. i joked with my family that it could have been a ufo. they weren't able to see this or the next object, however, i guess because of the way we were seated and the available windows.

a few minutes later as i continued driving west, i spotted a bright, yellowish-white short streak in the sky roughly in the direction the object was going. i immediately thought it must have been a jet after all and had reached a cruising altitude and produced a contrail. this image was in the southwestern sky near the afternoon sun but lower and slightly north. i continued to try and observe the object and soon noticed that it didn���t change shape or move. taking a longer look, it appeared to be a very bright rod-shaped object in a slightly slanted upright position. a yellowish-white radiance or cloud immediately surrounded the brighter interior. i soon lost sight of this object because of the trees.

we stopped at a local business to look around. about 15 minutes later we started back for home, traveling east. after we made a turn onto us 29 north, i glanced back at the western sky and noticed the bright object again. it did not appear to have moved from its former position.

i don���t know if the two objects were associated, and the first one could well have been a plane. the second bright object really has me wondering, though. i would like to find out if some sort of cosmic event, such as a supernova or planetary alignment, caused that bright object, as it appeared to be as fixed in the sky as a star at night (in fact, i jokingly told my family that it could be the star of bethlehem). that���s hard to imagine, though, since it was still broad daylight and the object was near the sun.
content.summary: Observed grey metallic craft moving towards a bright rod-shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was working at kathy kwiatkowski's ranch on bull creek road in greeley hill/ coulterville area (209) 768-2332 on the 9th of december from 3:00 to 6:00pm.  i was working on a horse named cassinova and kathy at the same time out by her barn. i looked up and saw a long thin craft that was just still and steady above the tree line- it was not close or at least did not appear that way. i would say in relationship to a regular commercial airplane the object may have been slightly closer. the objet started to shift or spin clock wise about 90o and then go counter clock wise but was so fast the manuver was blurred and then the object had split into two that had a strobe light quality but shape was hard to decipher. honestly if i did not see the craft split i probably would have thought it was a plane or something "normal". the only difference was that the lights blinked really fast, no noise, a beam of light that was pretty faint, and the flight patterns were odd.  the objects, one on my right flew at a casual pace away from the other one, while the other one had a beam of light comming from it shining in a 45o angle towards the ground but not on the ground since it was so high in the sky  and headed in our direction which was directly in front of it. this second craft was also at a casual pace. i was a little freaked out so i thought we better get in the barn since it was comming towards us and i was suspicious of that beam of light.  connie welsh (209)878-3336 of greeley hill, kathy and myself ducked into the barn which was probably 12 feet from where we were working on the horse. we lost sight of the craft since it flew over the barn and then could be seen again off to the right side of the barn with the beam of light now projecting 45o angle in the sky not towards the ground.The craft ended up doing a complete circle and came to the point where it had split then drifted further away from us but still directly in front of us. 
  connie's dog was in her car at the other side of the barn. she went to check in on him only to see several more crafts on the other side. she called to us and we got there just in time to see two more longer crafts break the same spinning way into now 4 more crafts as well as 2 others that had already spilt prior to us going on that side of the barn. three of the crafts, total, had beams of light that pointed in different directions: one horizontal across the skyline, one above, and the earlier craft did both towards the ground and above. we watched the pairs move away from its mate and how their beam was comming from one of the pairs only. kathy's ranch is very open and you can see the whole area.  the crafts surrounded the area very high up in a horseshoe shape that appeared somewhat uniform or organized.  we watched until they drifed farther apart and felt like we had a window of opporutunity to leave. it was very close to 6 pm when connie and i drove out kathy's driveway in separate cars.
content.summary: Crafts over greeley hill, ca that split in half.

content.detailedDescription: Did not see or hear them; on the picture they appear as bright dots - four with some kind of winglike structure.  i was on a parking garage looking west. when i was perusing the pic i noticed the lights and thought they were aircraft but they do not look like it. i have never seen or thought i saw a ufo before in my entire life and this is the second experience in the past month; the other i documented on oct 31 - three weeks before this pic was taken
content.summary: Only saw the objects when reviewing digital picture.

content.detailedDescription: At about 8:45 as i was going outside to watch the meteor shower we saw somthing that looked like satalite going west but then we saw a lot of smaller stars moving with it in a triangle. later, we saw 4 more all moving the same way until we went to watch the first one again we looked back and 3 of them were gone. this was such an amazing thing.
content.summary: 5 large black triangles flying from east to west 3 disapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a picture of the moon and this showed up in the photo. it may be nothing more than water. i don't know. the fact that the light seemed concentrated on one side (that facing the moon/light source) seemed unusual to me though it would make sense were it simply a drop of water.

i cropped the picture because it was huge and emailed the interesting part to a friend who ran it through some enhancements and this is what turned out. i'll include the original and the enhancements. i'm fairly certain it's simply an anomaly but i figured i'd submit it regardless. hope i'm not wasting anyone's time.
content.summary: Picture taken of the moon on 12/12. perhaps a photo anomaly.

content.detailedDescription: After working until dark in dayton texas my son and i were heading home to porter texas on fm 1960.Traveling west we could see airplanes stacked up for miles on the glide path for bush intercontinental airport.I noticed the field to the right of my truck began to glow .I told my son, he looked at the field then he looked up.He said that is the biggest plane he has ever seen,as it passed us i saw it had no strobes on it.It was only about 500 feet above the ground.It had white lights on what appeared to be the wing tips with one red light in the center.Its heading was west north west,in five minutes it was gone.It did not make a sound,the wingspan was as wide as five boeing 747's side by side.It looked like a huge triangle shaped wing.It appeared to be about a quarter mile from our truck as it passed us.An airplane this close to us would make noise.No sound-no strobes or rotating beacon lights.I don't know what this was,i just know it was not an airplane that the public knows.I did not have a camera with me this is my biggest regret.
content.summary: Flying triangle witness.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i went out to look at the moon because tonight it is supposed to be the brightest all year. found out about this on the computer. the moon is really bright, the light seems to illuminate from it. i was looking at the moon and saw this star that was flickering and since i have seen this before, i knew what it was. i went to get the binoculars and when i looked at it, all i could say was oh, wow!  it had these red and green lights on it that seemed to flicker or pulsate.  i gave the binoculars to my husband so he could see it, and he was as astonished as i was.  you could even see the red lights flashing on it with just the naked eye.  i looked around the sky and saw another object that had the red and green lights on it as well, but a lot smaller then the first object. there were a couple of planes that were flying around these objects. don't know if they were out there because of the moon or if they were checking out the strange objects. they were both stationary, but seemed to move very slowly. looking at them through the binoculars, they looked like they were kinda bobing around.  we had to come in because it is very cold out side tonight.  i just looked out side and they are still there. this isn't the first time i have seen this, but every time i do, it is very exciting, sometimes when i have seen them, i feel a little uneasy, but didn't feel that way tonight.  i would really like to know what it is out there.  i feel i'm looking at a ufo, but i'm not sure if it is or not.  has anyone else ever seen an object as we have seen?  what can mufon, tell me about it?  is this considered to be a ufo?
content.summary: Sparkling star.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were driving on i-70 west, coming home from brazil to terre haute. we were about half-way there when i noticed a reddish light just above the treeline, on the left side of the road. it looked like a dim, oval star, kind of flat, and i thought to myself that it looked somewhat like the planet mars, but larger and a little brighter (and misshapen). i noticed it because i'd been looking at the sky a few minutes before and hadn't seen anything like it. i didn't say anything to my husband at first, but i kept watching. it stayed in the same place, and after maybe five minutes i lost track of it as we passed under a bridge in a more densely wooded area. 

a few minutes later i saw it again, this time on the right side of the road, still slightly above the treeline, just hovering. as we reached a bend in the road and headed into a clearing, i got a better view and finally asked my husband if he saw it too, and he did. as we watched it looked like it was flashing, but not like a strobe, rather, the light was steady but looked like it faded off and on, from rust-red to orange-yellow. we went through a list of what it could be, from a microwave tower to a plane, none of which matched what we were seeing. after a few more minutes of watching it, we ran into more trees for a just a moment, and when we cleared them it had disappeared. by this time we'd reached terre haute. as far as our feelings, i definitely felt curious, and a little excited. my husband seemed a little apprehensive.
content.summary: Strange reddish light, stationary above treeline.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been very reluctant to post my video and have been sitting on it for over 2 months deciding whether to post it or not. well today is the day. i assure you everything i am saying here is 100% true.
i am a new member.. all my life i never believed in ufos. i thought people who claimed they had sightings were nuts. three years ago i started watching youtube videos of ufos and i was shocked at what i saw people capturing on home video and then i became a believer. i do believe that  flying triangles are governmental in nature.(just my opinion) i saw films from the 80's on youtube where they were using antigravity technology in air craft. i do think the orbs and the flying serpents are ufo's and are of another world. i am 42 female, was a new ager, astrologer. studied esoteric books for over 30 years.I had many paranormal experiences through my life including nde, astral projections and many weird happenings throughout my life. to long to explain here, believe me i could write a astonishing book on my experiences.
i recently found out about the new world order about 6 months ago and how the governments of the world are actually practicing,worshiping lucifer and erecting statues of the pagen deities over governmental sites.I have read about it for so many years, but as much as you study esoteric knowledge somewhere in the back of your head you remain a little skeptical, because you are never 100% sure how much of what you are reading is really true. i know the  most important symbology of the new world order is the triangle. i do know astrology is true, not sunday morning newspaper astrology but real astrology. the subject is profound, complicated and at times frightening.
i recently had 3 major events happen to me in the past 4 months that have me scratching my head. i have one on video which i will post.
the one i have on video is the most puzzling
please keep in mind my camera that captures video is broke so it looks like night time when i took the video but it was still light in my room when i filmed this. something is wrong with the settings for the lighting. the picture i took shows about the same lighting as when i filmed the video of orbs and triangles. also the flashing red light you see is from my camera. it take ok pictures but the video settings are broke.
it was the last week of sept 2008 about 5:30pm. i got out of the shower and went to my closet in my bedroom. as i was about to walk into my closet i briefly noticed a white glowing orb on my wall. i thought at first glance it was the sun beaming onto my wall from my window. it seemed strangely glowing, oval and about 2 1/2 inches in diameter. i proceeded to walk into my (walk in closet) and change. when i walked out of my closet and i walked up to the wall for a better look i was amazed and shocked to see a dozen flashing multicolored triangles next to the glowing orb. flashing in and out. i couldn't believe my eyes! i said out loud wait here i am getting my camera, that's why on the video you hear me say "thank you". i ran to find my camera which can also film video. by the time i got back with the camera the orb had reduced in size to about 1 inch maybe 2 in diameter, the flashing triangles were still there. i watched it for a few minutes before it faded out. (which you see on the video)
i want to point out that prior to this, about 1 month before this event i had prayed to god to please let me see him, and about 2 weeks later i the first experience in these series of episodes. my husband was sleeping in the bedroom, the lights and tv were off and i had just laid down. i looked up at the ceiling and there was a 5 inch glowing orb on my ceiling, i couldn't believe what i was seeing. (it looked the the one you see in the video but bigger) i looked around the room to see to see if it was a reflection coming from somewhere. it was pitch black in the room and no explanation for it. i woke my husband up because i thought i was seeing things. he turned around half asleep and said he saw it to. honestly this was very unnerving, i put the covers over my head and fell asleep. 2 weeks later is when i had the flashing triangle episode.
about a week after the triangle episode about 5:00am in the morning i was looking out my back window because i heard some noise coming from the business strip in the back of our parking lot(see pic). i opened the window and noticed a truck in the business strip which i assumed was the noise i was hearing. out of nowhere i see what looks like a comet with a flame going perfectly horizontal 100 feet above my parking lot. i was shocked because it did not come down vertically from the sky. it was perfectly horizontal like someone shot it through a cannon. it was a very big size and very bright. i can't explain what i saw. i saw a video on youtube of a flaming comet that was coming down from the sky, but was traveling one way then would change directions, then change directions again. it was a amazing video and not a comet as it appeared to be because of the erratic changes in direction.
i saw a posting today on mufon dec 12th 2008 from someone that had a similar experience withe glowing orbs in his house.
i know in the kabbalah, ancient egyptian esoteric sun worship, astrology and gnostic circles this event may be seen as a good omen, being that the up side triangle represent fire and the downward triangle water, the male and female principle and a sign of enlightenment, but after listening to tom horn, steve quayle, david flynn and joye pugh i have came to believe that maybe it is something more sinister, maybe a deception. i am not sure but the more i have learned about what is happening in the world the more frightened i become.
i was baptized catholic have been a new ager for most of my life until now. something very strange is happening in the world today and i believe we are on the cusp of something very unbelievable that is going to happen. the fact that there are governmental groups worshiping lucifer as the bearer of light and erecting pagen statues has made me run back to my christian roots. if there is lucifer then there is jesus. ufos are in the bible as well as stargates worm holes and inter dimensional beings, fallen angels and nephelim. research tom horn, steve quayle, david flynn and joyce pugh. i know it's clearly states in the bible that a falling away would occur and a great deception will spread the world over and even the elect will be deceived
i am in a state of confusion as to it's meaning. my esoteric knowledge says good. my faith say's bad. 
your thoughts are much appreciated....But before you comment please research those researchers i have listed above.
i listed on mufon message board you can post a reply on the message board
content.summary: Video of orb and flashing multicolor triangles in bedroom.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my home walking my dog in the yard. my house is next to the mountains and michaux state forest. it was a clear night, no moon, and the stars were clear and numerous. looking west, i saw a very brilliant red light moving to the north. the object seemed fairly close to me, and at about the altitude of a low flying private aircraft. the red light was very bright, quite a bit brighter than i would even expect from landing lights at that distance. my first thought was that an aircraft moving left to right in my view should display a green marker light. a red light should either not be visible, or be dimmer. i also noted that i could hear no engine noises of any kind. the object moved in a straight line, and quickly passed out of sight behind the mountain. i looked around and could see no other traffic in the sky. i cannot say if the light was the whole of the object, or was attached to something larger that was not lit. the sighting was fairly brief, and i did not think in time to see if stars were occluded near the light. i was and continue to be curious about what i saw. i have a digital camera, but knew when i saw the red light that there would be no time to get it. i wish i had noted the date and time of this event, but at the time, had no thought of sharing my experience. i have felt compelled to submit this report after seeing the recent ufo program on the history channel about mass sightings in pa. i pay attention to the stars and air traffic. i have seen other odd things that have attracted my attention, but this is the least explainable. bright landing lights in the distance can appear strange unless you wait them out until the aircraft come closer.
content.summary: Looking west, i saw a brilliant red light moving north and making no noise.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling westbound on i-10 towards beaumont , tx from lake charles, la when i noticed very bright flashes of colored light that was coming from inside the clouds to my left . i monitored the lights dancing around for aprox. 5-10 min and was able to catch a few photos with my camera phone "one of which i am sending with this report" then they where gone . when i got home i uploaded the pictures i took and was happy to be able to share this one with everyone . this was taken through the front windshield without flash during the day with a camera phone if that helps .
content.summary: Rainbow like  balls of light at time of photo but changed.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving over a bridge in stuart fl heading to her house in port st lucie. we were decending down the bridge. as we got to the stop light. i noticed a red auborn light sitting in the sky. i have lived here for 14 years in the same samll town. so i knew right away it was odd. my first words were, "what the hell is that"? she said "i dont know" as we came up closer to it it was on the east side of us1 federal hwy. it was as high in the air as a small hotel wich it happend to be next to a small hotel. mabey 100 to 200 feet up. it was not moving so i said "oh its got to be a tower". then as we pass it she says to me. "no there is no tower". so as we pass buy it two more lights come on. they were wite. we could see that it was infact not a tower, it was completly silent, and it was hovering over us not more then 200 feet up and it was a triangle. thats when we pulled over and got out on the side of the road. as soon as we stoped. it started to move as if it knew we saw it, as if it was retreating. we watched it move form its place as it started to move away. it moved in the oddest way. it was slow. way to slow to be anything normal. at the same time though it was so far away sooooo fast. we watched it slowly come out in the middel of us1. then we noticed that 3 more lights on one side of the triangle came on, and one in the middle, and it started to go southeast across us1 going over trees. i can only describe its movement as very shakey but slow and sturdy at the same time. at that point we wanted to chase it. she kept screaming my name. "chris get in the car" !! i was so fixed i could not look away. finnaly i heard her and we made a u-turn and started heading south. mind you we were not that far from the birdge we just came off of. we were not even at the second light from the bridge. so it took us mabey 30 seconds to get where it was headed. we thought ok well it went over the trees. lets drive over the bridge agian. we will see it from that hight. we would have. the bridge it a very high bridge. as soon as we got to the begining of the bridge it was already gone. i mean we were with in 2 mabey 4 feet form seeing this thing over the trees when we were on the bridge. wich if it was a plane helicopter or anything like that. reguardless of what it looked like we there is no disscusion that we would have see it once we were on the bridge. it was gone. we drove over the bridge and back over agian. we never saw it.  i have seen many ufos. close to 13 or 14 in my life. my girl friend did not even belive. she was in shock. i was in awe. i must tell you guys it felt like what ever this thing was it knew we saw it and ran after we saw it. she said to me i belive now. and that she noticed that her whole life she has never seen anything like that, and that it only seems to happen when she is around me.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It was a triangle that had lights on each point and on one side had 3 separate lights.
